body:
I was planning that we could land this after we tag the release, but I could retarget this to a branch. I don't think it matters much, since we won't have continued development before this can hit master.

I was a little unclear about moving the actions, but I could go back and look at that again. They are more ingrained in the Django app, so it is a bit harder to detangle. I figured I'd do the easier parts and then get feedback.

Another thing I'm unsure about is the name of the top level directory, and the move from `control/js/*.js` to `control/*.js`. I'd be happy to change those, if anyone has opinions.
